system.description:
Prerequisites

STR 13, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.aFfVrifmKKT9Rpzw]{Two-Weapon Melee Fighting}

Benefits

The characterâ€™s penalties for fighting with two melee weapons are reduced by 4 for the primary hand and 8 for the off hand.

Special

If the character has the Two Weapon Ranged Fighting feat, they can mix both Ranged and Melee weapons. The benefits of the Improved Two Weapon Melee Fighting replace the benefits of the Two Weapon Melee Fighting feat.
